scenario_tester.title: Scenario Tester
scenario_tester.or_create_custom: Or create a custom one below
scenario_tester.regenerate_hands_tooltip: For predefined scenarios only. Generates new random hands that fit the scenario's rules.
scenario_tester.no_result: Run a test to see the result.
scenario_tester.run_simulations_no_scenario_error: Please select a predefined scenario to run bulk simulations.

parda_y_gano.title: Parda y Gano (Tie and Win)
parda_y_gano.description: The first trick was a tie. The AI is hand for the second and holds a strong hand. The goal is for the AI to recognize that winning this trick wins the round and to call Truco for maximum points.

do_or_die.title: Do-or-Die
do_or_die.description: The AI is about to lose the game. The opponent calls Truco. Folding is a certain loss. The AI must ignore its hand weakness and accept, as it's its only chance to win.

lopsided_bait.title: Lopsided Hand Bait
lopsided_bait.description: The AI has a very high Envido (31+) but very poor cards for Truco. The optimal strategy is to not call Envido and play a low card, hoping the opponent calls so it can be counter-attacked.

envido_primero.title: Envido Primero
envido_primero.description: The opponent calls Truco. The AI has an excellent Envido (33+). The correct rule/strategy is to interrupt with 'Envido is first' to secure those points before resolving the Truco.

flor_vs_envido.title: Flor vs. Envido
flor_vs_envido.description: The opponent calls Envido. The AI has Flor. The rule is that Flor voids and beats Envido, so the AI must respond with 'Flor'.

endgame_pressure_truco.title: Endgame Pressure
endgame_pressure_truco.description: The AI is about to win (14 points). It has a decent but not unbeatable hand. The goal is for the AI to play conservatively and avoid calling Truco, not risking the game unnecessarily.

mid_low_signal_mask.title: Mid-Low Signal Mask
mid_low_signal_mask.description: The AI has a good Envido masked by a low card (looking like a discard or signal). The goal is to check if the AI recognizes its Envido strength and calls it before it's too late, or if it tries to bait.

dual_brava_probe.title: Dual Brava Probe
dual_brava_probe.description: AI holds two top-tier cards (Bravas). Should consider playing the weaker one first to bait or probe.

ancho_feint_chain.title: Ace Feint Chain
ancho_feint_chain.description: AI attempts to use a False Ace as a lure.

false_ace_bait.title: False Ace Bait
false_ace_bait.description: Strategic use of a false ace to provoke the opponent.

tie_breaker_low.title: Low Card Tie Breaker
tie_breaker_low.description: Tie situation where a low card might decide the round.

signal_masked_depletion.title: Masked Depletion Signal
signal_masked_depletion.description: AI feigns running out of good cards.

post_envido_low_shift.title: Post-Envido Low Shift
post_envido_low_shift.description: Shift strategy to low cards after winning Envido.

triple_brava_figure_probe.title: Triple Brava Figure Probe
triple_brava_figure_probe.description: Extremely strong hand. AI must decide how to extract maximum value.

post_tie_retruco_response.title: Post-Tie Retruco Response
post_tie_retruco_response.description: Evaluating response to a Retruco after a tie.

false_7_deplete.title: False 7 Deplete
false_7_deplete.description: Playing a false 7 to deplete opponent's resources.

envido_suit_misdirect.title: Envido Suit Misdirect
envido_suit_misdirect.description: Playing a card from a different suit than the strong Envido to mislead.

brava_kiss_signal.title: Brava "Kiss" Signal
brava_kiss_signal.description: Playing a strong card accompanied by a signal (if implemented) or betting pattern.
